name: Matteo Salvini - The Green Padania Ranger
name_original: Matteo Salvini - The Green Padania Ranger
description:
Are you a racist, xenophobic or just of the extreme right? Well, then this game is for you! Impersonate the charismatic leader of Lega Nord, Matteo Salvini, and fun to shoot on clandestine boats headed towards the island of Lampedusa

For comments, reports of bugs or informations: scardygames@yahoo.it
